caption.p: Heat shock 70 (Hsp70) protein facilitates ZIKV infection. Heat induction (A) in Huh7.5 cells and EGFP-Hsp70 overexpression (B) in 293 T cells was performed before infection of cells with ZIKV. Viral titres in harvested culture supernatants at 48-h post-infection were quantified by plaque assay. N = 5–6 per data point. Error bars denote standard error of the mean.
